articles.author: Todd Gillespie and Paul Burkhardt
articles.title: Transnet strike: Coal price surges in Europe as SA exports drop to lowest level since 2021 - News24
articles.description: The price of importing coal to Europe’s largest ports rose the most since May as a strike in South Africa curtails shipments of the fuel during the middle of an energy crisis.
